Html:
Hi,

I wonder is it possible to use enterprise library security application block with prism silverlight?

Thanks

Ahmet

Hi Ahmet,

There is not an authorization mechanism supported in Prism out-of-the-box.

I do not know your exact scenario, but Enterprise Library Security Application Block supports different security providers to grant/denied access, which might be a way for using them together.

For more information on using Entlib Security App Block with SL applications you could check the Security Application Block[link] forum and the Silverlight forum.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
